Platform                Shipped (prebuilt) OpenSSL version
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
iOS                     OpenSSL 1.1.0h  27 Mar 2018
mac                     OpenSSL 1.1.0h  27 Mar 2018
Emscripten              OpenSSL 1.1.0h  27 Mar 2018 built with emscripten 1.38.25
Android                 OpenSSL 1.1.0g  2 Nov 2017

See prebuilt/<platform>/build_instructions.txt for... build instructions!
